channel.title: Marco on Marco Kwak
channel.description: Recent content in Marco on Marco Kwak

item.title: Why do I start this blog?
item.description: I have been writing articles in my Korean blog for a while. Thanks to those who read, my first book was published 2 years back. I always wanted to start writing technical articles in English for wider range of audiences from all over the world. And today, it finally came to action.
